1123375540029800449.text: Another day in the books Charlotte. The sun will set over the Queen City April 30, 2019 at 08:08PM #cltwx

1123360194111660032.text: Just a ROBO call from @unccharlotte saying stay in place and listen to police commands.

1123405872850509824.text: NinerAlert: Campus remains on lockdown, exams canceled through Sunday. Check email for more information   #unccharlotte #unccstrong #unccshooting

1123443322226343936.text:
. @unccharlotte will
be at Condition 2 tomorrow, suspended operations, only mandatory services open. #UNCCStrong #unccshooting

1123348431014113280.text: Stay in a safe spot on campus the lock down remains up as a possible active shooter report on campus near Kennedy. #UNCC

1123356254703955970.text: Man what a horrible day to have our last class and then have this happen. Texting my students to make they are all okay right now. #UNCC #unccshooting

1123420065255383041.text: NinerAlert: Remaining occupants of UNC Charlotte campus buildings may depart at this time. Check email for more. #unccharlotte #UNCCshooting #UNCCStrong

1123353274860670976.text: Free concert tonight on campus was suppose to start at 6pm lots of students on campus for Waka flocka flame concert. #unccharlotte #shooting

1123330786478915590.text: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR DOWNTOWN DAVENPORT!!! Immediately seek higher ground if you are in this area!  The Mississippi River flood waters may soon breach a portion of the flood barrier.  Flash flooding may develop shortly. #iawx #ilwx #flood

1123416839374147585.text:
We are #CharlotteStrong. Our thoughts and prayers are with those affected by today's tragedy at @unccharlotte.
